loadingErrorGuidance.developer_comment: Guidance for what to do if loading Endless Key failed
loadingErrorGuidance.string: Please try restarting Endless Key by closing this window and double clicking the launcher again.

loadingErrorTitle.developer_comment: Title heading for when Endless Key could not load due to an error

loadingRetryTitle.developer_comment: Title heading for when Endless Key could not be started due to an error

loadingTryingAgain.developer_comment: Page content shown when trying to load Endless Key again after an error

poweredByKolibri.developer_comment: Footer text to acknowledge that Endless Key is based on Kolibri

welcomeDocumentTitle.developer_comment: Document title for the welcome page

welcomeTitle.developer_comment: Title heading for the welcome page
